title: What's a Spore Crawler!? - Skirmish ICYFAR - G1 #197)
excerpt: In today’s ICYFAR players were challenged to avoid large battles and win through many small skirmishes! They weren’t allowed to use more than 24 units in any engagement!  THIS WEEKS ICYFAR Challenge: "Melee Madness" - You can only use hand-to-hand combat units! For Terran you're allowed to use hellbats,
